item.description: Privacy Policy Tribalingua built the Tribalingua app as a Commercial app. This SERVICE is provided by Tribalingua and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.
